title: How do I add a widget to a home screen?
answer:
1.         On a home screen, touch and hold a blank area. The **Set home screen** window is displayed.


 2.         Touch **Widgets**. 

 3.         Select a widget in the list and drag it to a desired home screen. 

 4.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45279) to return to the home screen. 

 Note: If the blank area in the home screen is insufficient to receive widgets, a new home screen is automatically created on the right side of the home screen and the widgets will be placed in the new home screen. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45280)
